name: NSControlTextEditingDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of NSControl subclasses to respond to editing actions.

items.name: func control(NSControl, isValidObject: Any?) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked when the insertion point leaves a cell belonging to the specified control, but before the value of the cellâ€™s object is displayed.

items.name: func control(NSControl, didFailToValidatePartialString: String, errorDescription: String?)
items.desc: Invoked when the formatter for the cell belonging to control (or selected cell) rejects a partial string a user is typing into the cell.

items.name: func control(NSControl, didFailToFormatString: String, errorDescription: String?) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked when the formatter for the cell belonging to the specified control cannot convert a string to an underlying object.

items.name: func control(NSControl, textShouldBeginEditing: NSText) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked when the user tries to enter a character in a cell of a control that allows editing of text (such as a text field or form field).

items.name: func control(NSControl, textShouldEndEditing: NSText) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked when the insertion point tries to leave a cell of the control that has been edited.

items.name: func control(NSControl, textView: NSTextView, completions: [String], forPartialWordRange: NSRange, indexOfSelectedItem: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>) -> [String]
items.desc: Invoked to allow you to control the list of proposed text completions generated by text fields and other controls.

items.name: func control(NSControl, textView: NSTextView, doCommandBy: Selector) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked when users press keys with predefined bindings in a cell of the specified control.

items.name: func controlTextDidBeginEditing(Notification)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the control started editing its text content.

items.name: func controlTextDidChange(Notification)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the control made changes to its text content.

items.name: func controlTextDidEndEditing(Notification)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the control finished editing its text content and committed the changes.
